dct_title_s: Africa secundum legitimas projectionis stereographicae regulas et juxta recentissimas relationes et observationes in subsidium vocatis quoque veterum Leonis Africani Nubiensis Geographi et aliorum monumentis et eleminatis fabulosis aliorum designationibus pro praesenti statu ejus potius
dct_description_sm: exhibita a Ioh. Matthia Hasio ... impensis Homanniorum Heredum.
"Cum privil. S.C.M. nec non S.R.M. Polon et Elect. Sax. A. 1737."
Includes text and ornamental cartouche with Africans, Europeans, flora, fauna, etc.
